resume.title: Jack Hoyt
resume.objectives: My goal is to gain more practical knowledge and contribute in a team of software or mobile application developers.

job.job_title: Mobile Application Development Intern at Assembly Co in Manchester, NH May 2015 - September 2015, May 2016 - August 2016
job.job_summary: Helped make mobile applications for various companies in the Manchester, New Hampshire area. Primarily focused on program refactoring and debugging. Contributed to the development of three applications that are still used by businesses in the area today. Two applications implemented group messaging and planning, allowing employees within a company to communicate and organize more efficiently. Helped build an application for Williamson's Finances to connect its customers to their information at any time.

qualifications.education: Northeastern University Class of 2020, Computer Science B.S.
qualifications.additional_information: Programming experience in C++, C#, and Java
